main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Condon, Oregon on July 29, 1966, where observers watched an object in the sky for approximately 3.75 hours.
interesting points: The object changed colors from white to red as it moved,The object appeared to spin like a top,It was observed that the object had an azimuth of 175° and elevation of 25°,The direction of the object was predominantly east after initially moving west,Observers used binoculars for a clearer view of the object.
sighted object: one spinning object in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. [REDACTED], a housewife aged 45, and a lawyer aged 52
